name: Fall Balance Ball (itch)
description:
3D Platformer.
Balance on platforms, jump and pass barriers. Collected crystals will give you super powers.

FEATURES: 

  • A lot of levels with increasing difficulty and various obstacles.

  • There are 7 super abilities in the game: Slowing Time, Strengthening, Dash Forward, Powerful Jump, Teleportation, Double Jump, Building of auxiliary platforms.

  • The game has a world leaderboard. Compete for the best time.

  • The second game mode for the first chapter, which complicates the passage. The introductory rule is to collect all the crystals to complete the level.

Download the Steam Demo Free!

It would be very nice if you want to support the development of future games, leave a review about the game. They are sorely lacking.
